text: Vintilǎ Cristescu was a Romanian long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Romanian male long-distance runners Category:Romanian male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Romania Category:Place of birth missing
title: Vintilă Cristescu
